lw3dge.game

Class Scene

  • java.lang.Object
    • lw3dge.game.Scene
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Updatable

    public class Scene
extends java.lang.Object
implements Updatable
    This class represents a Game Scene, including a list of objects, lights, sky-box, and object management methods.
    Author:
    Jared Massa
